attributes.action: Act on those e-petitions which have attracted 10,000 plus signatories
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This PM and members of his Government keep telling us that they know what we want, then proceed to ignore the real calls from citizens. 
We know what we want, and are telling them. Once the signatory list on any petition is over 10,000, the relevant Minister should act upon the spirit and intent of the petition - not just make promises to take note of them.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
